personal.workingTitle: Senior Full Stack & AI Engineer (Entrepreneurial Mindset)

frontpage.title: Lukas Stockburger
frontpage.subtitle: Senior Full Stack & AI Engineer (Entrepreneurial Mindset)

profileSummary: Experienced Full-Stack Product Engineer with a strong entrepreneurial mindset. I don't just write code; I build systems that generate revenue. Specialized in TypeScript, Next.js, and AI pipelines, I've taken products from zero to 7M+ user events/month. I combine deep technical expertise (Node.js, BullMQ, Vector DBs) with product analytics (PostHog, Mixpanel) to ship production-grade AI solutions that solve real business problems.

workExperience.title: Co-Founder & Lead Engineer
workExperience.description: Impact Jobboard & Automation Platform (getbaito.com, jobscouts.io & talentalert.io)
achievements: Architected and built the entire platform using Next.js, TypeScript, tRPC, and Prisma
Scaled backend infrastructure to handle ~10,000 monthly career page crawls and 7M+ user events
Implemented production-grade AI pipelines using Vercel AI SDK and OpenAI for automated job classification
Designed asynchronous workflows with BullMQ for reliable high-volume data processing
Integrated Vector Databases (Weaviate, Typesense) for semantic search and matching
Set up comprehensive product analytics using PostHog to drive data-informed product decisions
Managed the full product lifecycle from concept to revenue, validating features with real users

workExperience.title: Product Builder & Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Developed and launched ~25 web projects and prototypes for various clients
Full-Stack development with React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB
Focused on rapid prototyping and iterative development to validate business hypotheses quickly

workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Built modern web applications using React Native, Vue.js, and Headless CMS architectures
Collaborated in agile SCRUM teams to deliver high-quality client solutions

workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Implemented test-driven development practices with Mocha.js

workExperience.title: Co-Founder
